body:
Here is what I met:
E:\workspace\flutter\flutter>flutter doctor

[âˆš] Flutter (Channel master, v0.2.4-pre.64, on Microsoft Windows [Version 6.1.7601], locale zh-CN)

Sending crash report to Google.
Crash report sent (report ID: a0d5d9474bcb0b0e)
Unhandled exception:
```
NoSuchMethodError: The getter 'isMacOS' was called on null.
Receiver: null
Tried calling: isMacOS
#0      Object.noSuchMethod (dart:core-patch/dart:core/object_patch.dart:46)
```

title: Crash when execute flutter doctor in command line in windows
